subject: Automobile Racing
Records and Achievements
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Matt Kenseth earned the fifth pole of his career and his first since Dec. 2009 by breaking Kurt Busch’s year-old mark while qualifying for Sunday’s race.
snippet: Matt Kenseth earned the fifth pole of his career and his first since Dec. 2009 by breaking Kurt Busch’s year-old mark while qualifying for Sunday’s race.
